title: Joe Pera Talks To Stephen Colbert (Extended Interview) | Colbert Classic
description:
Comedian Joe Pera sat down with Stephen to talk about everything from his favorite grocery store routines to his ideal date. Catch Joe Pera on his show ''Joe Pera Talks With You'' on Adult Swim and HBO Max.
